snippet.title: Behind the scene, June: Tales of Cyberspace
snippet.description:
Kickstarter Making of video
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/junethegame/june-tales-from-cyberspace

We’re so thrilled to share with you the journey in creating her universe!
If you feel like giving a hand and support this incredible adventure on #Kickstarter, buy the game in advance and get some incredible #3Dprinted sculptures of June’s world

With your help, we’ll be able to bring this project to the level of our ambition, and create a true home for June in the metaverse.

So… DO IT FOR JUNE !

https://linktr.ee/Junethegame

✨June is a modern fable in the form of a video game. Taking place in the surreal landscapes of the metaverse, June will have to solve intricate puzzles in order to bring a lost world back to life.

It is an artistic experience that merges together the world of gaming and fine arts, combining elements of traditional video games together with real-world artworks from contemporary artists of the DSLcollection.
June is created by ChildrenofCyberspace, in collaboration with In-Dialog and dslcollection.

Team : 
Calin Segal, Tiffany Attali, Eleonore Audi, Codin Segal, Jorge Wieneke & Alexis Lacroisade
